price: Na katika kila kitu tumeumba kwa jozi ili mzingatie.
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: Na kila kitu tumekiumba namna mbili, yaani kwa jozi, ili mpate kukumbuka muuamini uwezo wetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
